tool_description: Calculates comprehensive revenue metrics including gross revenue, net revenue, fees, and growth rates from transaction data.

transaction_data_id.description: Reference ID of previously extracted transaction data

reporting_period.description: Period for revenue calculation: daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly

include_refunds.description: Whether to subtract refunds from gross revenue

include_fees.description: Whether to subtract processing fees from net revenue

compare_previous_period.description: Whether to compare with previous equivalent period

currency_conversion_rate.description: Exchange rate for currency conversion if needed

error_messages: Invalid transaction data ID: Provided ID does not reference valid transaction data.
Invalid reporting period: Use one of [daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly].
Invalid currency conversion rate: Must be a positive number greater than 0.
Invalid target currency: Use valid 3-letter ISO 4217 currency code.
Insufficient data for comparison: Previous period data not available for comparison calculation.
usage: Provide transaction_data_id and reporting_period, configure revenue calculation options including refund handling, fee deductions, and period comparisons.

net_revenue.description: Net revenue after refunds and fees

total_refunds.description: Total amount refunded in the period

revenue_by_period.description: Revenue breakdown by sub-periods within the reporting period
